downloadTitle: Image Files for HelloWorldPicnic Sample Model in PowerPivot and Power View
downloadDescription: These image files support the samples for Power View and PowerPivot for Excel for SQL Server 2012 that you can also download from the Microsoft Download Center.
detailsSection: HelloWorldPicnicImages includes 24 .png image files that fall into four categories of fruits, vegetables, breads, and beverages. For each of the 24 items, there are two files: a picture and a drawing of that item. For each of the four categories, there are two files: a picture and a drawing of that category. These images are used in Power View and PowerPivot HelloWorldPicnic Samples for SQL Server 2012. For more information on Power View for SQL Server 2012, visit the Power View overview page on the TechNet library.
installInstructionSection: License information: See http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. To the extent possible under law, the person who associated CC0 with this work has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to the .png files in HelloWorldPicnicImages.zip. This work is published from: United States. Attribution not required. This information is also included in the readme for Power View HelloWorldPicnic sample images.
